name: PreoperativeTemperatureManagementProcedures
title: Preoperative Temperature Management Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Describes denominator criteria for CMS MIPS 424 Preoperative Temperature Management),(Data Element Scope: CPT codes for Surgical and Therapeutic procedures.),(Inclusion Criteria: As defined by CMS MIPS 424.),(Exclusion Criteria: Term listed in CMS MIPS 424)
